svg.content: <mxfile host="app.diagrams.net" agent="Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/128.0.0.0 Safari/537.36" version="24.7.17" scale="1" border="0"> <diagram id="8uEnaA01nbsa7fLauyXk" name="intro"> <mxGraphModel dx="1434" dy="1268" grid="1" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="1" pageScale="1" pageWidth="850" pageHeight="1100" math="0" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="0" /> <mxCell id="1" parent="0" /> <mxCell id="cwZ9vV1iul-KUy3ql910-2" value="HTTP<br>x-forwarded-client-cert" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;entryX=0;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" parent="1" source="cwZ9vV1iul-KUy3ql910-3" target="cwZ9vV1iul-KUy3ql910-7" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="cwZ9vV1iul-KUy3ql910-3" value="Envoy" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="300" y="170" width="120" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="cwZ9vV1iul-KUy3ql910-4" value="<br>mutually<br>authenticated<br>TLS" style="rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;entryX=0;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;strokeColor=default;edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;" parent="1" source="cwZ9vV1iul-KUy3ql910-5" target="cwZ9vV1iul-KUy3ql910-3" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="cwZ9vV1iul-KUy3ql910-5" value="client<br>with<br>client cert + private key" style="shape=umlActor;verticalLabelPosition=bottom;verticalAlign=top;html=1;outlineConnect=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="110" y="170" width="30" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="cwZ9vV1iul-KUy3ql910-6" value="" style="points=[[0,0.5,0],[0.24,0,0],[0.5,0.28,0],[0.995,0.475,0],[0.5,0.72,0],[0.24,1,0]];verticalLabelPosition=bottom;sketch=0;html=1;verticalAlign=top;aspect=fixed;align=center;pointerEvents=1;shape=mxgraph.cisco19.key;fillColor=#000000;strokeColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="150" y="170" width="31.12" height="14" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="cwZ9vV1iul-KUy3ql910-7" value="Keycloak" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="580" y="170" width="120" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="cwZ9vV1iul-KUy3ql910-8" style="rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;endArrow=none;endFill=0;dashed=1;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;exitPerimeter=0;" parent="1" source="cwZ9vV1iul-KUy3ql910-12" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="360" y="120" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="290" y="190" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="cwZ9vV1iul-KUy3ql910-10" value="Client certificate information is forwarded to Keycloak in XFCC HTTP header." style="shape=note;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;backgroundOutline=1;darkOpacity=0.05;size=14;fillColor=#fff2cc;strokeColor=#d6b656;align=center;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="440" y="80" width="230" height="55.51" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="cwZ9vV1iul-KUy3ql910-11" style="rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;endArrow=none;endFill=0;dashed=1;entryX=0.5;entryY=1;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;entryPerimeter=0;" parent="1" target="cwZ9vV1iul-KUy3ql910-10" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="500" y="180" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="746" y="375.77" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="cwZ9vV1iul-KUy3ql910-12" value="TLS is terminated here." style="shape=note;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;backgroundOutline=1;darkOpacity=0.05;size=14;fillColor=#fff2cc;strokeColor=#d6b656;align=center;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="190" y="80" width="160" height="55.51" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>
